author: Reuters Editorial
title: Pivot Technology Solutions Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Pivot Technology Solutions Inc:
* PIVOT TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS, DECLARES DIVIDEND
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 14.5 PERCENT TO $369.3 MILLION * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
